author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The House passed the Big, Beautiful Bill. Today’s show breaks down the noise and tells you what’s actually in it.

According to Fox News:

The bill is a sweeping multi-trillion-dollar piece of legislation that advances Trump's agenda on taxes, immigration, energy, defense and the national debt. It's sought to make a dent in the federal government's spending trajectory by cutting roughly $1.5 trillion in government spending elsewhere. The U.S. government is over $36 trillion in debt and has spent $1.05 trillion more than it's collected in the 2025 fiscal
title: Watch: Why Is Trump's Big Beautiful Bill Making the Left so Angry?

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The left has destroyed gender specific places under the guise of inclusivity. And while it’s more common to hear about a male pretending to feel some type of way to gain access to the female locker room, it’s still a problem when it’s the other way around.

Three boys were filmed without their consent in the locker room by a female student who claimed to feel some type of way. Rather than the school defending the victims, the school has decided that they must be investigated, as they were not being inclusive enough.


🚨Scoop: @7NewsDC obtained the video at the heart of Loudoun County Public Schools’ investigation into boys who are uncomfortable with a girl in the boys locker room. Should LCPS d
title: Male students were suspended raising complaints of a (trans) girl in their locker room, now there’s video

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
In the progressive pursuit to slash parental rights from law-abiding citizens, the State of Washington has taken the “guilty until proven innocent" approach. Subsequently, they have decided to presume all parents are abusers and do not have their children’s interests at heart.

This is evident through newly signed legislation by Gov. Bob Ferguson. He claims the legislation, House Bill 1296, is intended “to ensure a safe learning environment where every student has the chance to thrive,” according to KOMO News. However, that could not be further f
title: Blue state governor signs law stripping parents of rights over their child's medical records, and you can guess why

author: Brodigan
description:
https://www.congress.gov/bill/119th-congress/house-bill/1President Donald Trump had some words for Bruce Springsteen. How’s that working out for you, Bruce? The Big, Beautiful Bill has made it through the House. We’re going to break through the noise and tell you what’s actually in it. Trump met with the president of South Africa and brought some receipts to the party. The Left isn’t happy about it because they think genocide is okay as long as it’s against white people.

TRUMP HITS SPRINGSTEEN
title: Trump's Big Beautiful Bill Passes: What's In it and Why is it Making the Left so Angry? (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
I'll be honest, I'm surprised this is the first time we've seen a woke white woman make this argument. That your daughter is having scholarships and other opportunities stolen from her by boys who claim to be girls is a valuable life lesson for her. One that teaches her grit and resilience, and I guess gay stuff like "equity."

Welcome to Naperville, a suburb outside of Chicago, where an all too familiar story took place. A 7th-grade boy who claims to identify as a girl took first place in multiple events over girls who actually are girls, because boys are born with certain biological advantages in strength and athletics, like bone density and what critics call "testosterone." One side
title: Woke mother "rejects" reality, rants that your athletic daughter losing to trans boys teaches her a valuable life lesson

author: Brodigan
description:
Donald Trump is the most talented president ever to preside over the United States of the Americas. And if there is one thing he is better at than making America great again, it's golf. He has such a mighty swing, the ball can travel thousands of miles and target his haters right in their cranium, as evident by him knock Bruce Springsteen on his arse. The fake news media wants you to believe this video is "doctored," but I know that you know what we think about the fake news media.

Bruuuuuuce, to show how blue collar he is, told a crowd in England how much he hates what's happening in America, even though it's what America voted for. Because if there is one thing blue collar Americans love, it's elitist celebrities running their country do
title: Trump responds to Bruce Springsteen's anti-American rant as only he can... by hitting him with a golf ball (well, kinda)
